summary: Adds a new weapon called Vuunthrad.
descriptionHtml:
What is the point in having a Shield of Ysgramor if there isnt a one handed weapon to match the set. Well I made this mod to add a weapon called Vuunthrad that you can use with the shield.

This is still a work in progress so please DON\'T complain. If anyone can teach me how to make a new weapon model, please teach me, I will credit you.

Location: On Ysgramor\'s coffin in Ysgramor\'s Tomb.

Please tell me what you think about it in the comments.
author: defcon05
